invite.inviteManageListings: You will now be able to manage listings and applications that you are a part of from one centralized location.
invite.inviteWelcomeMessage: Welcome to the Partners Portal at %{appUrl}.
invite.toCompleteAccountCreation: To complete your account creation, please click the link below:

register.welcomeMessage: Thank you for setting up your account on %{appUrl}. It will now be easier for you to start, save, and submit online applications for listings that appear on the site.
register.toConfirmAccountMessage: To complete your account creation, please click the link below:

csvExport.body: The attached file is %{fileDescription}. If you have any questions, please reach out to your administrator.
csvExport.title: %{title}

changeEmail.message: An email address change has been requested for your account.
changeEmail.onChangeEmailMessage: To confirm the change to your email address, please click the link below:

confirmation.subject: Your Application Confirmation

eligible.fcfs: Applicants will be contacted on a first come first serve basis until vacancies are filled.
eligible.lottery: Once the application period closes, applicants will be placed in order based on lottery rank order.
eligible.waitlist: Applicants will be placed on the waitlist on a first come first serve basis until waitlist spots are filled.
eligible.waitlistContact: You may be contacted while on the waitlist to confirm that you wish to remain on the waitlist.

confirmation.interview: If you are contacted for an interview, you will be asked to fill out a more detailed application and provide supporting documents.

whatToExpect.FCFS: Applicants will be contacted by the property agent on a first come first serve basis until vacancies are filled.
whatToExpect.lottery: Applicants will be contacted by the agent in lottery rank order until vacancies are filled.
whatToExpect.noLottery: Applicants will be contacted by the agent in waitlist order until vacancies are filled.

confirmation.whileYouWait: While you wait, there are things you can do to prepare for potential next steps and future opportunities.
confirmation.shouldBeChosen: Should your application be chosen, be prepared to fill out a more detailed application and provide required supporting documents.

eligibleApplicants.FCFS: Eligible applicants will be placed in order based on first come first serve basis.
eligibleApplicants.lottery: Eligible applicants will be placed in order based on preference and lottery rank.
eligibleApplicants.lotteryDate: The lottery will be held on %{lotteryDate}.

confirmation.thankYouForApplying: Thanks for applying. We have received your application for
confirmation.readHowYouCanPrepare: Read about how you can prepare for next steps
confirmation.applicationPeriodCloses: Once the application period closes, the property manager will begin processing applications.
confirmation.contactedForAnInterview: If you are contacted for an interview, you will need to fill out a more detailed application and provide supporting documents.

leasingAgent.contactAgentToUpdateInfo: If you need to update information on your application, do not apply again. Instead, contact the agent for this listing.

mfaCodeEmail.message: Access code for your account has been requested.

scriptRunner.subject: Your Application Confirmation Number for Fremont Family Apartments
scriptRunner.pleaseSave: Please save this email for your records.
scriptRunner.information: You previously applied to Fremont Family Apartments, but an error resulted in sending your confirmation email without your confirmation number. Your application number and confirmation number are re-sent below. Thank you for your patience.

forgotPassword.subject: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.callToAction: If you did make this request, please click on the link below to reset your password:
forgotPassword.passwordInfo: Your password won't change until you access the link above and create a new one.
forgotPassword.resetRequest: A request to reset your Detroit Home Connect website password for %{appUrl} has recently been made.
forgotPassword.ignoreRequest: If you didn't request this, please ignore this email.

lotteryAvailable.signIn: Sign In to View Your Results
lotteryAvailable.resultsAvailable: Results are available for a housing lottery for %{listingName}. See your housing portal account for more information.
lotteryAvailable.whatHappensContent: The property manager will begin to contact applicants in the order of lottery rank, within each lottery preference. When the units are all filled, the property manager will stop contacting applicants. All the units could be filled before the property manager reaches your rank. If this happens, you will not be contacted.
lotteryAvailable.otherOpportunities1: To view other housing opportunities, please visit %{appUrl}. You can sign up to receive notifications of new application opportunities
lotteryAvailable.otherOpportunities3: If you want to learn about how lotteries work, please see the lottery section of the

lotteryPublished.header: Lottery results have been published for %{listingName}
lotteryPublished.resultsPublished: Lottery results for %{listingName} have been published to applicant accounts.

singleUseCodeEmail.message: Use the following code to sign in to your %{jurisdictionName} account. This code will be valid for 10 minutes. Never share this code.
